Airbomber seen the fear in Infectra's eyes.

"Why are you afraid?" Airbombe=
r asked her...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:25 AM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Doom Ice...


  Infectra


  *Infectra frowns. She really didn't kno=
w anything about this or what to do but her heart took gained force over he=
r brain where she only thought about her love for Airbomber and didn't want=
 to lose him. She slowly walks over feeling a bit scared but raises her han=
ds in air with the others but still felt scared*

    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday=
, August 23, 2000 12:05 AM
    Subject: Doom Ice...


    A satsis pod fall=
s in front of the Maximals base. At the same time, Deemos and his group are=
 repaired and come from the CR Chamber, their wounds were fatal but not maj=
or. The 6 of them sport a different paint job, all 6 of them are purple, bl=
ack, and white now. Deemos and his group go outside and see the pod. Deemos=
 gives the thumbs up to His comrades. They start to program it.

    "Name?=
" Deemos asked.

    "It says the name is...Tint." Rizopas says. Deemos's s=
mile is huge.

    "Make the name Doom Ice, you can do that, if she was dum=
b enough to escape in a stasis pod, we reprogram her!" Deemos said.

    "I=
sn't that what we are against?" Artist asked.

    "No, Artist, it's not, w=
e are just trying to make more bots good!" Deemos replied. Airbomber walks =
up and sees the pod.

    "What are you guys doing with the pod?" He asked.=
 Suddenly, every one of Deemos' group members had a blaster stuck in Airbom=
ber's face.

    "I say we kill him!" Blender said.

    "I say we make him=
 join us in our fight!" Diskus said.

    "For once your intelligent, Disku=
s!" Stronghold said. Airbomber is sweating now, he didn't know what that me=
ant but it scared him. Deemos came up from behind him. (Don't know if Infec=
tra is there, but I assume she is, if she's not then tell me) Stronghold an=
d Blender target Infectra. Deemos starts to pump some phony info into his m=
ind with the device, and bam! He already looks serious.

    "Infectra, you=
 might as well leave." Deemos said.

    "I will join you, you guys are rig=
ht, we do need less violence, the war must end, and if there must be a war =
to end the war, so be it!" Airbomber said. He turns back to Infectra.

    =
"Do not worry, Infectra, I still love you, you don't have to leave." Airbom=
ber said. Deemos laughed and rubbed his hands together as Rizopas reprogram=
s Tint and makes her Doom Ice. Doom Ice is first seen now, she stands and l=
ooks around. Deemos is in a new form, but she reconizes him. But, she has n=
o fear, he seems different. She knew of their war, she didn't know how, but=
 she knew. (Reprogrammed and memory addage while she was asleep)

    "I sh=
all join you." Doom Ice said. Deemos looked at his growing group, A few mor=
e and he'll rule the Neo Beast Wars! It's a sure thing! He thought. He had =
8 now, and it felt pretty good. Doom Ice didn't remember Land Mine a single=
 bit, and remembered Deemos as your lord and almighty leader.

    "For the=
 Maximals, and everyone's protection and peace! Until all...are one!" Deemo=
s shouted. Doom Ice and Airbomber's hands were raised and the 8 of them rai=
sed their hands high in the air. Airbomber waved for Infectra to do it to, =
not caring about what she thought of this group...

-----------------------=
